p: Mevalonate pathway has a minor contribution to the GA biosynthesis pathway [ 10]. In this regard, we observed that two GHMP kinase genes ( Ma08_g34050 and gene-C4D60_Mb08t33270) having mevalonate kinase activity (based on GO annotation) had increased expression in MT. It is also known that cytosolic acetyl-CoA is further involved in the biosynthesis of mevalonate-derived isoprenoids [ 30]. One gene ( gene-C4D60_Mb01t19300) annotated as cytosolic acetyl-CoA showed decreased expression in MT.
